tagline: 'Read the best books first or you may not have a chance to read them at all.' --Henry David Thoreau
description: Helios is an open API of ideas. Inspired by Mortimer J. Adler's Syntopicon, this taxonomy of 102 fundamental topics of human interest contains over 500,000 references to the works of eminent thinkers from Homer to Shakespeare, Euclid to Einstein, Aristotle to Descartes. Peruse the passages and contribute your own.
